com.envibe.envibe.dao

Class NewsItemDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.envibe.envibe.dao.NewsItemDao

  • @Repository
public class NewsItemDao
extends Object
    Data access object for news items that are stored in a permanent JDBC-compatible datastore. Utilizes CRUD model.
    Author:
    ARMmaster17

      • create

        public void create(@Valid
                   @Valid NewsItem newsItem)
        Creates a pre-validated post in the permanent datastore. Also triggers the newsfeed update service.
        Parameters:
        newsItem - Pre-validated post model object to insert.
        See Also:
        NewsFeedUpdateService.triggerWorker(int)

      • read

        public NewsItem read(@NotNull
                     @NotNull int post_id)
        Searches for and returns a post with a matching ID.
        Parameters:
        post_id - Post to search for.
        Returns:
        NewsItem model object if the specified ID exists. Otherwise returns null.

      • read

        public List<NewsItem> read(@ValidUsername
                           String user_name)
        Searches for and returns a list of posts created by the specified user.
        Parameters:
        user_name - Username to search for in list of post creators.
        Returns:
        List of unsorted posts with specified username as the original author.

      • update

        public void update(@Valid
                   @Valid NewsItem newsItem)
        Updates the attributes of the specified NewsItem model using post_id to find original record.
        Parameters:
        newsItem - Updated NewsItem model object to replace original.

      • delete

        public void delete(@Valid
                   @Valid NewsItem newsItem)
        Deletes the specified valid NewsItem from the permanent datastore.
        Parameters:
        newsItem - NewsItem model object to delete, searched by post_id.
